title: Horror Stories and Terrifying Tales
description: This horrifyingly diverse collection of short stories is packed with a punch. Inspired by the 1980’s horror film classics, you’ll be taken on one suspense-filled journey after another.Radioactive bugs, monster water creatures and an overwhelming sea of the undead are only a few of the gruesome treats that await you inside this book. Not for the faint of heart, these short tales will leave you crawling back for more.
author: P.A. Douglas
